channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6833, MT6853, MT6873, MT6877, MT6893
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6833, MT6853, MT6873, MT6877, MT6893

item.title: CVE-2022-26427|2024-08-03T05:03:32.930Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6833%2C%20mt6853%2C%20mt6873%2C%20mt6877%2C%20mt6893
item.description: In camera isp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07085540; Issue ID: ALPS07085540.

item.title: CVE-2022-21790|2024-08-03T02:53:36.281Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6833%2C%20mt6853%2C%20mt6873%2C%20mt6877%2C%20mt6893
item.description: In camera isp, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06479306; Issue ID: ALPS06479306.
